title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is presented as a current, practical reality at KPMG Poland. Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska describe tools and workflows — including an AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI conversational assistants, and the KPMG Clara platform — that enable full-population analysis, real-time audit management, improved documentation, and modern client communication, while noting required auditor competencies and implementation challenges such as data security, regulation, and potential AI-related risks.
bullets: AI tools are already embedded in audit workflows to handle repetitive tasks and large-data analysis.
KPMG demonstrates specific solutions: AI Transaction Scoring, Clara AI assistants/agents, and the KPMG Clara platform.
Audits are moving from sampling toward full-population analysis for more comprehensive insights.
AI supports documentation, disclosure analysis, and real-time management of the audit process.
Key concerns include auditor upskilling, implementation challenges, data security, regulatory environment, and AI-related risks.
takeaways: Expect audits to use full-population analysis rather than sampling—prepare to respond to more granular, dataset-wide findings.
Ensure secure, well-structured data access and exchange to meet AI-enabled audit processes and regulatory/data-security requirements.
Engage with auditors early about platforms like KPMG Clara/Clara for Clients to streamline real-time communication and documentation.
Plan for staff competencies and internal processes that support AI-driven audit workflows and address potential AI-related risks.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Copilot provides real-time visual support for home projects and repairs. It can see what you see and deliver clear, step-by-step instructions for issues ranging from leaky pipes to overflowing washing machines.
bullets: Real-time visual assistance: Copilot can view the problem as you see it.
Step-by-step instructions to guide repairs.
Targets common household repair scenarios (e.g., leaky pipes, overflowing washers).
Designed to give clear, actionable guidance.
Aimed at supporting hands-on troubleshooting in real time.
takeaways: Real-time visual assistance and step-by-step guidance are core capabilities to note when evaluating technician support tools.
The described features map to on-site repair and maintenance workflows that require clear procedural guidance.
Capabilities focused on clear, actionable instructions could support consistency and reduce variability in field repairs.
Decision-makers should consider whether similar visual, real-time guidance could be applied to their operational maintenance use cases.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG set on Talos-II, and the footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield launch trailer emphasizes support for NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (link in description).
Game genre: 3D real-time strategy RPG where you play the Endministrator exploring Talos-II.
Trailer capture details: GeForce RTX 5080, 4K Ultra settings, DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
Official game site and NVIDIA article links provided for more information.
Social channels listed (X, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok) and hashtags #ArknightsEndfield #RTXOn #DLSS4.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being used in a shipped title—assess support for DLSS 4 in client or rendering workloads.
Trailer capture used a high-end GPU (GeForce RTX 5080) at 4K Ultra—plan GPU capacity for 4K capture, QA, or marketing pipelines accordingly.
Documentation links in the description point to implementation details (NVIDIA and game site) useful for technical evaluation and compatibility checks.

items.title: Rate Insurance Boosts Agent Efficiency with Agentforce and Gemini

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video shows how Rate Insurance boosts agent efficiency using Agentforce and Gemini. The description also directs viewers to learn more about the Google Cloud and Salesforce partnership via the provided link.
bullets: Demonstration of Rate Insurance improving agent efficiency with Agentforce and Gemini.
Highlights a customer use case in the insurance sector.
References the Google Cloud and Salesforce partnership with a link for more information.
Content focused on agent productivity and cloud/CRM collaboration.
takeaways: The video documents a customer deployment (Rate Insurance) using Agentforce and Gemini to boost agent efficiency—relevant if your infrastructure supports insurance agent workloads.
The Google Cloud–Salesforce partnership is emphasized; factor this partnership into cloud and CRM platform evaluations.
Use the provided partnership link as a resource when assessing vendor integrations and platform choices for agent-facing applications.
Consider whether your data center/cloud capacity and integration architecture are prepared to support similar agent productivity tools.

items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who has spent the last 18 months living out of two suitcases and living rent-free in Portland, Oregon by pet sitting full time. She brings in about $60,000 a year, and her story is featured in CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
bullets: Charly Stoever lives rent-free in Portland, Oregon by pet sitting full time.
She has been living out of two suitcases for the past 18 months.
Her annual income from this arrangement is approximately $60,000.
Charly works as a financial coach.
Profile produced by CNBC Make It. as part of the Millennial Money series.
takeaways: Based on the description, some individuals earn meaningful, location-independent incomes ($60K/year) while living highly mobile lifestyles, which could influence demand for consistent digital and power services.
Mobile, travel-oriented lifestyles highlighted here suggest a user base that may value resilient connectivity and local access services at varied locations.

Stories of alternative housing models (rent-free living via service exchange) indicate potential shifts in residential occupancy patterns that planners and operators could monitor for changing load distributions.
The profile underscores a segment of workers who combine income generation with mobility; tracking such trends may help anticipate distributed demand on networks and facilities.

items.title: New CO2 Battery Stores 8 Hours of Energy

ai.summary: Based on the available description… A giant bubble of carbon dioxide can store 20 megawatts of energy. The description says these new batteries are meant to help manage fluctuating renewable supplies and support a global shift to clean energy.
bullets: Giant carbon dioxide "bubble" functions as an energy storage device.
Storage capacity reported as 20 megawatts.
Aimed at addressing fluctuations in renewable energy generation.
Positioned as a technology to support the global transition to clean energy.
takeaways: 20 MW storage capacity suggests potential for sizable short-term load support for grids or large facilities.
Could help balance renewable intermittency, improving reliability for grid operators and data centers.
Represents an additional option in the portfolio of technologies for decarbonization and energy resilience.

items.title: AI w cenach transferowych – jak wykorzystać jej potencjał? | Monika Palmowska, Jakub Roszkiewicz

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI is already reshaping transfer pricing work—enabling profitability monitoring, comparative analyses and automation of documentation—while experts stress it will strengthen rather than replace tax advisors. The podcast highlights practical implementation points: address data and RODO risks, use secure environments like Digital Gateway, integrate AI with ERP for intelligent benchmarks, and begin by ordering processes and building competencies.
bullets: AI applications include monitoring rentowności, benchmarking and automatyzacja dokumentacji cen transferowych.
Sztuczna inteligencja ma wspierać doradców podatkowych, nie zastępować ich.
Główne ryzyka: dane, bezpieczeństwo, RODO i zjawisko 'halucynacji' AI.
Digital Gateway wskazane jako bezpieczne środowisko do pracy z AI.
Kluczowe kroki wdrożenia: integracja z ERP, uporządkowanie procesów i rozwój kompetencji.
takeaways: Rozważ AI do automatyzacji raportowania TP i monitorowania rentowności, by odciążyć operacje finansowe.
Upewnij się, że wdrożenia AI spełniają wymogi bezpieczeństwa danych i RODO przed przetwarzaniem wrażliwych informacji.
Wybieraj bezpieczne środowiska pracy z AI (np. Digital Gateway) dla danych finansowo-podatkowych.
Planuj integrację AI z istniejącym ERP, by uzyskać inteligentne benchmarki i płynne raportowanie.
Rozpocznij od uporządkowania procesów i szkoleń zespołu, by maksymalizować korzyści z AI.
